--- title: Losses keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Where all the losses are situated" ---

num_tries_gt_zero[source]

num_tries_gt_zero(scores, batch_size, max_trials, max_num, device)

scores: [batch_size x N] float scores returns: [batch_size x 1] the lowest indice per row where scores were first greater than 0. plus 1

warp_loss[source]

warp_loss(positive_predictions, negative_predictions, num_labels, device)

positive_predictions: [batch_size x 1] floats between -1 to 1 negative_predictions: [batch_size x N] floats between -1 to 1 num_labels: int total number of labels in dataset (not just the subset you're using for the batch) device: pytorch.device
